coffee.name: Latte
coffee.description: A wonderful coffee to work with, its almond and caramel notes are perfectly balanced by the bright, fruity yum of Los Ancestros.

coffee.name: Americano
coffee.description: Sweet, syrupy and delicious with notes of chocolate-covered cherry and blueberry.

coffee.name: Picollo
coffee.description: Red apple flows into delightful milk chocolate and orange notes that goes dreamily with, or without milk.

coffee.name: Magic
coffee.description: Best enjoyed all day every day, expect a creamy pecan texture sprinkled with bits of red grape and fig.

coffee.name: Mochacino
coffee.description: Fresh, juicy and oh so delightful Aricha is an Ethiopian must-taste.

coffee.name: Cappucino
coffee.description: Delightfully balanced, apple and macadamia notes are highlighted by a honeysuckle sweetness.

coffee.name: Decaf Espresso
coffee.description: Delightful all the way through, peach swims in caramel and custard.

coffee.name: Macchiato
coffee.description: Ranking high on our must-try list is La Bolsa from Guatemala.
